sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Card, CardContent ,Typography, Grid} from '@material-ui/core'; import styles from './Cards.module.css' const Cards=( {data: {confirmed , recovered,deaths,lastUpdate}}) =>{ if(!confirmed){ return 'Loading...'; } return(
Infected {confirmed.value} REAL DATE Number Of Active Cases Of Covid-19 Recovered REAL Data REAL DATE Number Of Recovered Cases Of Covid-19 Deaths REAL Data REAL DATE Number Of Death caused by Covid-19
) } export default Cards;
